name: ffretv-pidora
short_description:
ffretv-pidora design goal/points/ideas:
-Lowest Power available ffretv/mythtv backend possible for low cost.
-Design with intention to be solar/wind powered with battery backup.
NO POWER HUNGRY DEVICES NEED APPLY*

-Initial Limited frontend functionality.

---OpenELEC has the best frontend for frtv/mythtv in this scenario.
        An Important goal would be to bring people onboard to help port openmax to any version of mythtv> 20.2
    Let's do this for *-pidora/ARM and also put a solid frtv/mythtv frontend/backend in OpenELEC! Make sure we have compatablity for the older mythbox24 and the newer cMYTH.
-Up to 250G builtin uSD storage. More as prices come down on uSD cards.
-Optionally and/or occasionally: Serve up Wifi access point with limited connections via hostapd.
-Focus on free airwaves first.
